name: Marsh Malo
description:
Help Malo find his way home in this action platform game which draws inspiration from games such as Kirby's Dreamland, Bubble Bobble and Banjo Kazooie! Bulit for the the GB 8 game jam. This game recreates the Gameboy experience as much as possible with only 4 colours and a 160 px x 144 px resolution. 

- - - - - -

Controls:

Directions: Arrows / WASD
Jump: Z / K
Lick: X / K

Code + Art: @denis_grenier86
Sound Design: @vaughnthesheep
